name: He (Mo)
description:
A short poetry game about gender idendity, finding yourself and leaving your fear behind. 

Features: 

-Solve small puzzles and explore His Apartment 

-Read poetry and stories

-Look through His diary that expands with each level

-Manage to leave your fear behind

-Unique art- and writing style

TW: Mentions of suicide, selfharm, dsyphoria.
